Module com.example.miniproyecto4
Package com.example.miniproyecto4.model.Ship

Class ShipFactory

java.lang.Object
com.example.miniproyecto4.model.Ship.ShipFactory
public class ShipFactory extends Object
Factory class for creating ship instances in the Battleship game. Provides methods to create individual ships and complete fleets according to the game's ship composition rules.

    • createShip

      public static IShip createShip(ShipType type)
      Creates a ship of the specified type without position information.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of ship to create
      Returns:
      a new ship instance of the specified type

    • createShip

      public static IShip createShip(ShipType type, Coordinate start, Orientation orientation)
      Creates a ship of the specified type with a starting position and orientation.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of ship to create
      start - the starting coordinate for the ship
      orientation - the orientation of the ship (horizontal or vertical)
      Returns:
      a new ship instance with the specified configuration

    • createFleet

      public static List<IShip> createFleet()
      Creates a complete fleet of ships for the game. The fleet consists of: - 1 Carrier - 2 Submarines - 3 Destroyers - 4 Frigates
      Returns:
      a list containing all ships in the fleet
